Manx: O Hiarn Yee Ooilley Niartal ta er chroo Niau as thalloo,
English: O Lord Almighty who has created Heaven and Earth,
Diplomatic: O hiarn Yee ooilley Niarthal.  ta er chroo Niau as thalloo,

Manx: Quoi ta dy chooilley ghooinney ayns aggle as er creau roish,
English: Before whom every man is in awe and trembling,
Diplomatic: quoi ta dy chooilley ghonney ayns aggle as er creau rosh

Manx: Dy ooashley nagh vod ve er ny ymmyrkey,
English: To worship these cannot be born,
Diplomatic: dy ooishley nagh vod ve er ny ymmyrkey

Manx: As Dty farg as dwaoie er peccah nagh vod ve er ny hurranse,.
English: And Thy rage and abhorrence of sin cannot be suffered.
Diplomatic: as dy farg as dooie er pccah nagh vod ve er ny hurrans.

Manx: Agh, ta Dty ghialdyn graysoil as myghinagh erskyn towse
English: But Thy imeasurablely graceful and merciful promise,
Diplomatic: Agh ta dy ghoaldyn graysoill as myghynagh er skin thowse

Manx: Nagh vod ve er ny ronsagh.
Diplomatic: nagh vod ve er ny runsagh.

Manx: Son t’ou Uss yn Çhiarn smoo syrjey,
English: For Thou art the greatest, highest Lord,
Diplomatic: Son tou uss yn Chiarn smoo sirjey

Manx: As jeh çhymmey mooar, surranse foddey,
English: And of great compassion, long suffering
Diplomatic: as jeh chymmey mooar surranse foddey

Manx: As feer vyghinagh as arryssagh ec olkys dooinney.
English: And truly merciful and sorried by the wickedness of man.
Diplomatic: as feer vighynagh as arrysagh eck olkys dhoiney.

Manx: T’ou uss O Hiarn cordail rish Dty vieys wooar,
English: Thou, O Lord, in accordance with Thy great goodness,
Diplomatic: Tou uss O Hiarn cordail rish dy vieys wooar

English: Hast promised repentence and a pardon,

Manx: Dauesyn ta er yannoo peccah Dty oi,
English: For those who have sinned against Thee,
Diplomatic: dausyn ta er yannoo peccah dy oi,

Manx: As jeh Dty vyghin erskyn towse er phointeil arrys
English: And of Thy immeasurable mercy has appointed repentence,
Diplomatic: as jeh dy vighyn erskin thowse er pointteill arrys

Manx: Da peccee, dy vod ad ve er ny hauaill.
English: For sinners, that they may be saved.
Diplomatic: da peccee, dy vod ad ve er ny hauaill.

Manx: Cha vel Oo er-y-fa shen er phointeil arrys ...
English: Thou hast not therefore appointed repentence ...
Diplomatic: Cha vell Oo er y fa shen er pointeill arrys
